subject: Travel
title: The Lost City of Z
description: A 60-second lesson on The Lost City of Z.

hook.text: A British explorer vanished in the Amazon in 1925 searching for a lost civilization he called 'Z.'

buildup.text: Percy Fawcett believed an advanced city lay hidden in the Brazilian jungle based on old Portuguese documents.

discovery.text: He entered the jungle with his son and a friend. They sent one final message, then silence.

twist.text: Over 100 people have died searching for Fawcett or the city. None have found either.

climax.text: Recent discoveries of ancient Amazon cities suggest Fawcett may have been right. Something was there.

punchline.text: He was mocked for believing in a jungle city. Science later proved him right.

quiz.question: What happened to Percy Fawcett?
options: He found the city and stayed
He disappeared in the Amazon and was never found
